verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm so glad, I'm a part of the family of God
I've been washed in the fountain
Cleansed by His blood
Jointâ€“heirs with Jesus as we travel this sod
For I'm part of the family, the family of God
.
Now you notice we say brother and sister round here
It's because we're a family and these folks are so dear
When one has a heartache, we all shed a tear
And rejoice in each victory of this family so dear.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
From the door of an orphanage to the house of a King
No longer an outcast, a new song I sing
From rags to riches, from the weak to the strong
I'm not worthy to be here, but praise God I belong.
